item.title: How to Install EndeavourOS with Windows 10 Dual Boot
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to install EndeavourOS Dual Boot with Windows 10. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the EndeavourOS ISO. You need install Windows 10 first. I will choose plasma as desktop environment. I hope you enjoy! Links Download EndeavourOS Create EndeavourOS Install Media EndeavourOS Wiki Steps #1. Bios Considerations
